description: Doubting your worth, forgetting your power. Let's remember who you are.

art.title: Strength Symbol Creation
art.instruction: Design personal symbols representing your unique strengths and capabilities.
art.affirmation: I recognize and celebrate my unique strengths and capabilities

art.title: Confidence Crown Art
art.instruction: Draw or paint a crown representing your inner royalty and inherent worth.
art.affirmation: I wear the crown of my inherent worth and dignity

art.title: Success Story Timeline
art.instruction: Create visual timeline of your successes, achievements, and brave moments.
art.affirmation: I have a rich history of success and bravery that proves my capability

breathwork.title: Confidence Power Breathing
breathwork.instruction: Breathe deeply into your core, imagining drawing strength from earth and sky.
breathwork.affirmation: I breathe in power and confidence from earth and sky

breathwork.title: Capability Affirmation Breath
breathwork.instruction: Inhale 'I am capable,' exhale 'I trust myself.' Build confidence through breath and words.
breathwork.affirmation: I am capable and I trust myself completely

somatic.title: Confidence Posture Practice
somatic.instruction: Practice power poses - hands on hips, chest open, head high. Embody confidence physically.
somatic.affirmation: I embody confidence through powerful, open posture

somatic.title: Success Gesture Anchoring
somatic.instruction: Create a physical gesture (fist pump, hand on heart) and use it while recalling successes.
somatic.affirmation: I anchor confidence in my body through success gestures

cbt.title: Evidence of Capability
cbt.instruction: List evidence of your capabilities, skills, and past successes. Combat self-doubt with facts.
cbt.affirmation: I have abundant evidence of my capabilities and worth

rebt.title: Approval Need Challenge
rebt.instruction: Challenge 'I need everyone's approval to feel confident.' Confidence comes from within.
rebt.affirmation: My confidence comes from within, not from others' approval

neural.title: Confident Identity Installation
neural.instruction: Visualize yourself as naturally confident person. Install this as your true identity.
neural.affirmation: I am naturally confident and trust in my inherent capabilities

journaling.title: Confidence Evidence Journal
journaling.instruction: Write detailed accounts of times you felt confident and capable. Build evidence library.
journaling.affirmation: I have rich evidence of my confidence and capability

eft.title: Confidence Building Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though I doubt myself, I choose to recognize my worth and capabilities.'
eft.affirmation: I release self-doubt and embrace my natural confidence

emdr.title: Success Memory Enhancement
emdr.instruction: Enhance memories of feeling confident through bilateral stimulation.
emdr.affirmation: I carry confidence within me from all my past successes

yoga.title: Warrior Pose Confidence
yoga.instruction: Practice warrior poses to embody inner strength and confidence.
yoga.affirmation: I am a warrior with natural confidence and strength
